message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $120. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $90 is still too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to go up to $95. Could you meet me at that price?
